title: Camerata

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Wield the Transistor, attacking and absorbing a player.
- Use one obtained ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are attacking, the Mafia cannot perform a factional kill that night.
- Players killed by the Transistor will have their abilities granted to you, and they will be able talk in the Mafia faction chat at night.
- If you die during the day, the Transistor is passed to a random member of the Mafia, allowing them to make attacks and utilise abilities instead of their regular night action. Absorbed abilities and charges carry over.
- The Transistor may only make three attacks.

desc:
Post 669
*"When everything changes, nothing changes." That is the creed of the Camerata.*
